android.car.storagemonitoring

类 CarStorageMonitoringManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.storagemonitoring.CarStorageMonitoringManager

  • public final class CarStorageMonitoringManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API for retrieving information and metrics about the flash storage.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • getPreEolIndicatorStatus

        public int getPreEolIndicatorStatus()
        This method returns the value of the "pre EOL" indicator for the flash storage as retrieved during the current boot cycle. It will return either PRE_EOL_INFO_UNKNOWN if the value can't be determined, or one of PRE_EOL_INFO_{NORMAL|WARNING|URGENT} depending on the device state.

      • getWearEstimate

        @Deprecated
public WearEstimate getWearEstimate()
        已过时。 wear estimate data is unreliable
        This method returns the value of the wear estimate indicators for the flash storage as retrieved during the current boot cycle. The indicators are guaranteed to be a lower-bound on the actual wear of the storage. Current technology in common automotive usage offers estimates in 10% increments. If either or both indicators are not available, they will be reported as UNKNOWN.

      • getWearEstimateHistory

        @Deprecated
public java.util.List<WearEstimateChange> getWearEstimateHistory()
        已过时。 wear estimate data is unreliable
        This method returns a list of all changes in wear estimate indicators detected during the lifetime of the system. The indicators are not guaranteed to persist across a factory reset. The indicators are guaranteed to be a lower-bound on the actual wear of the storage. Current technology in common automotive usage offers estimates in 10% increments. If no indicators are available, an empty list will be returned.

      • getBootIoStats

        @Deprecated
public java.util.List<IoStatsEntry> getBootIoStats()
        已过时。 use CarWatchdogManager.getResourceOveruseStats(int, int) instead. WARNING: The metrics provided are aggregated through time and could include data retrieved after system boot. Also, the I/O stats are only for the calling package.
        This method returns a list of per user-id I/O activity metrics as collected at the end of system boot. The BOOT_COMPLETE broadcast is used as the trigger to collect this data. The implementation may impose an additional, and even variable across boot cycles, delay between the sending of the broadcast and the collection of the data. If the information is not available, an empty list will be returned.

      • getShutdownDiskWriteAmount

        @Deprecated
public long getShutdownDiskWriteAmount()
        已过时。 use CarWatchdogManager.getResourceOveruseStats(int, int) instead. WARNING: The metrics provided are aggregated through time and could include data not related to system shutdown. Also, the I/O stats are only for the calling package.
        This method returns an approximation of the number of bytes written to disk during the course of the previous system shutdown.

        For purposes of this API the system shutdown is defined as starting when CarService receives the ACTION_SHUTDOWN or ACTION_REBOOT intent from the system.

        The information provided by this API does not provide attribution of the disk writes to specific applications or system daemons.

        The information returned by this call is a best effort guess, whose accuracy depends on the underlying file systems' ability to reliably track and accumulate disk write sizes.

        A corrupt file system, or one which was not cleanly unmounted during shutdown, may be unable to provide any information, or may provide incorrect data. While the API will attempt to detect these scenarios, the detection may fail and incorrect data may end up being used in calculations.

        If the information is not available, SHUTDOWN_COST_INFO_MISSING will be returned.

        s

      • getAggregateIoStats

        @Deprecated
public java.util.List<IoStatsEntry> getAggregateIoStats()
        已过时。 use CarWatchdogManager.getResourceOveruseStats(int, int) instead. WARNING: The I/O stats returned are only for the calling package.
        This method returns a list of per user-id I/O activity metrics as collected from kernel start until the last snapshot. The samples provided might be as old as the value of the ioStatsRefreshRateSeconds setting. If the information is not available, an empty list will be returned.

      • getIoStatsDeltas

        @Deprecated
public java.util.List<IoStats> getIoStatsDeltas()
        已过时。 use CarWatchdogManager.getResourceOveruseStats(int, int) instead. WARNING: The I/O stats returned are only for the calling package.
        This method returns a list of the I/O stats deltas currently stored by the system. Periodically, the system gathers I/O activity metrics and computes and stores a delta from the previous cycle. The timing and the number of these stored samples are configurable by the OEM. The samples are returned in order from the oldest to the newest. If the information is not available, an empty list will be returned.

      • registerListener

        @Deprecated
public void registerListener(CarStorageMonitoringManager.IoStatsListener listener)
        已过时。 IIoStatsListener is deprecated. Use CarWatchdogManager.getResourceOveruseStats(int, int) to obtain I/O usage metrics or CarWatchdogManager.addResourceOveruseListener( java.util.concurrent.Executor, int, android.car.watchdog.CarWatchdogManager.ResourceOveruseListener) to be alerted when the package either overuses I/O storage or is about to overuse I/O storage. WARNING: The I/O stats returned are only for the calling package.
        This method registers a new listener to receive I/O stats deltas. The system periodically gathers I/O activity metrics and computes a delta of such activity. Registered listeners will receive those deltas as they are available. The timing of availability of the deltas is configurable by the OEM.

      • unregisterListener

        @Deprecated
public void unregisterListener(CarStorageMonitoringManager.IoStatsListener listener)
        已过时。 see registerListener(IoStatsListener)
        This method removes a registered listener of I/O stats deltas.
